projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

ntuṅeṁḍaḍakunaṁ sapr̥tthītala, prahr̥ṣṭiparituṣṭaroṣaruṣakoṣatr̥ṣṇapraṣa, śakaṙṣaṇaṣavr̥ṣṇivr̥ṣṭaṣalu:

dadinyanpramadḍeṅuripnya, gәṁkrodḍa:gәṁmohamaṅapakariḥtan·vnaṁdyaḥmgәṁnyan·, vus·vruḥpvaṅvaṁhayvata paḷpaḷḥpriḥbhabadriṁpraya:pәs·, vaita:hilyambәk·kuśumitalata:meṣita:rumtaruṇya ø °r̥ ø

lmәsasmuguyulviṙniṁśuvaḍana ø °{r̥} ø sakveḥnikiṁdadikabeḥtanorakatunanhala:lavanayu, ndasaṁpina:

paramakalpasәn·śr̥ddhara:riṅvatәkhyaṁ ø °r̥ ø bvattalkas·huvusgavayakәntikakaṁparahiteṁparampara°r̥gә:
p·, °aśramaśetratulyaniṅavak·skaṙkumuliliṁvuvustarahayu, vaihumidәṁpisaṁtbuvnaṁtaṅantamatalaṅkupa :ṅalapaśor·, tiṙthapavitratulyanimanaḥtaniṙmmalakadipvamandrakahniṁ ø °r̥ ø saparaṇaniṁvnaṁtuhagaṇa:

brata:ṁśvalalita ø °r̥ ø ndanahan·vignaniṅagavaitapabratalaṇa:marupuhirihati, yakadhә:ha nirayamaṅaḍīlaṇa:rivṅiya:tikakinatuturan·, niyata:manahiramagavaiytahantulakniṁjapasamaḍilaṇa
, °apana:karahimamaśakītasaṁmunivara:bhujagavilaśiha ø °{r̥} ø °ayva:taḥśaktebhogabvatpa°ḷpa°ḷ haluparipavkasaṅatuha, nindra:paruṣyaṅvaṁdhaṙpaṅanamayakuraṅasinkuṅihayu, lobhantomvab· tr̥ṣ

yatapaṅayamayamanayatamavә°r̥, kroñcapadhaṁrat·depadhahyun·lviha°ḷpaknamavtutaya°ḷñok·
